entry.title: Blue Wizard
entry.summary:
Author: HappyStrykr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,205Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Young Merlin Morgan receives a scholarship to Avalon Academy, and after deferring for a year, finally accepts that he canâ€™t live in the comfort of Michigan forever. Leaving behind almost everything, he enters a world of the rich and famous, bumping elbows with the very elite of America. Just attending such a prestigious school means he will be set for life. Now if he could just stop pissing off his blonde bombshell of a next door neighbor.

entry.title: The Bond Series: Season 2: Episode 1 "Home Isn't Home"
entry.summary:
Author: Foreverwolf_6

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,516Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Change is for the young, they say. Arthur and Merlin struggle to build their dream of Albion while facing old enemies from within, and a new enemy on the horizon threatens to destroy everything. Consequences for a choice made long ago rear. Are they strong enough to stand united, or will they falter?Season 2 of The Bond Series (I have fixed and reposted Season 1- I suggest you read that first, or this season won't make much sense). Note, you'll see each "book" in this season titled as an episode- make's it easier to follow the timeline, I think. For those who wished for less Merlin Whump and more Arthur- I have failed you, deeply :( I did make efforts to respect the "I wish Merlin was conscious more" requests!

entry.title: The Coin's Third Side
entry.summary:
Author: Araemrys

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,016Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 35

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has finally claimed the throne, but the crown is heavier than he imagined. Weary of the relentless pressure from the Council to marry and secure an heir, he turns to the only person he trusts for an escape. Merlin, eager for a reprieve from the stifling court and a chance to visit Hunith, readily agrees to a journey to Ealdor. However, their quiet retreat is shattered when they stumble upon a lone child in the depths of the woodsâ€”a discovery that changes everything. Or Deep in the woods on the way to Ealdor, Arthur and Merlin stumbled upon a lone child. Though they took her in out of necessity, Arthur saw it as an opportunity, a life where he, Merlin, and this child could finally be a family.

entry.title: The Phantom of Camelot
entry.summary:
Author: Honestly_good_pancakes

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,334Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 108

Summary: We all know how a small twist of fate can redesign the way a story is supposed to go. How one small act can reform reality into something almost unrecogniseable. So what would happen, if through one of these miniscule changes, Merlin never becomes Arthur's manservant? What if these two sides of the same coin, oblivious idiots, are never forced into close proximity to one another? What if, bound by fate, they live parallel lives within the walls of camelot Will destiny rewrite itself? Or force itself upon us? Or Arthur falls in love with the physician's apprentice without being made aware of that fact himself. Merlin is just trying to prove the stupid dragon wrong. Gwen was not prepared for any of this, and Morgana is happy to cause chaos. Leon technically did sign up for this, but in his defense, he didn't read the fine print. Gaius is desperately clinging on to the last remains of sanity in Camelot. Oh, and did I mention that there's a 'mysterious' sorcerer offering Uther unwanted advice? Because that happens too.

entry.title: Different Destiny: The Outlaw Prince
entry.summary:
Author: tansyuduri

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,497Chapters: 14/25Kudos: 155

Summary: When Merlin's magic is exposed shortly before season 2 starts, the path of destiny starts changing forever. Now on the run with Arthur, Morgana, and Gwen. Merlin hopes to convince Arthur that magic is totally good instead of him and Morgana just being an exception. Morgana, meanwhile, hopes to convince him to usurp his father. As allies are gathered and Arthur realizes the injustice in his kingdom, it looks more and more like he will have to act in a drastic way. A way he dreads. Â  Meanwhile, Arthur and Merlin are growing closer and closer and might just have feelings for each other. Something they probably should be better about realizing, considering the example of Gwen and Morgana right next to them. Â  In a land of myth and a time of magic, the destiny of a great kingdom now rests on the shoulders of four, their names: Merlin, Arthur, Guinevere, and Morgana

Summary: Arthur Pendragon is pissed. Yesterday Merlin had been late in waking him up, and today he didn't even show up at all? Arther had been getting ready to yell at Merlin again when Gwen came and told him something that changed his anger to panic.
